original_text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.
korean_text: 또한 그들이 손으로 너를 받들어 네 발이 돌에 부딪치지 않게 하시리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up,
lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.
sentences.korean_translation: 혹시 네 발이 돌에 부딪힐까 하여서다
